The files which can be downloaded from that site contain the Prorat trojan. DONT DOWNLOAD THEM, they compromise your computers security, they allow this bastard to browse your files, steal your data.
im in ur computer, im steeling ur data

Is  there no patch for the patched version yet? The 1.o patch started the game, but it was buggy. 

Anyway, I own the game, but the copy protection that follows screws up my DVD-writer/player and the disc hardly works. So I am forced to get a crack to play a game a paid for. Beautiful... Fucking Atari dogs.

Cracked exe files works with update (1.01)

If you need original files 

nwn2main.exe
nwn2main_amdxp.exe 

for a clean update they can be found in the "Root" directory in the NWN2 DVD.

Had a lot of game crashes before I updated.
Now it works swell :)  Great game!
